Termitron/Windlord::

Termitron woke up and he saw that his colony was in danger "By the 
colony!!!" shouted the bot and fired 10 shots against Unitrom, 5 
against Speed Viper, 10 against Shockwave. 


--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Cleder/Forrior/Hot Rod::
> 
> Cleder and Forrior had their guns aimed at Speed Viper, but were 
paying
> enough attention to hear incoming missiles. The both leaped out of 
the
> explosion area, and fires 3 plasma shots each at Shockwave.
> 
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> As the shots he had fired at Speed Viper's back rang out(last post)
> Unitrons streaked down between them, just infront of Hot Rod's face.
> He jumped back. 
> "Jeez, everyone hates me!"
> He shot two missiles up, at Unitron.
